message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested, but $110 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  Would you be willing to come down to $105?  I'm sure we can work something out.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $110 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $105. How about we meet in the middle at $107.50? I think that's a fair price for this amazing product.
